column1: Bosscat Kitchen & Libations////Probably my favorite place in the river oaks area
column2: the food is delicious and they have a weekend brunch that is never going to be forgotten once you eat it. Service was great so I left a great tip
column3: Brooke was in training but she was awesome. Jack the manager was also very very helpful
column6: it was my birthday and they treated me as a king! Will definitely be coming back
column7: the Carolina Salmon was great! Thanks again!
